name: PortfolioPulse
desc: Cloud automation workflow, which takes portfolio pdf statements, and delivers daily insights to your inbox. Currently ~85% complete until MVP.

name: AutoMate
desc: Generative AI Chrome extension used to create end-to-end workflows, meaning start at google.com and end the task with an amazon purchase, all done for you. Developed at Hack the North 2024.

name: StatementStandardizer
desc: Aggregation script which takes transaction CSVs from multiple banks, splits transactions by income and expense, and consolidates them into one file. A real time-saver in my personal finances.

name: PraxAI
desc: Learn languages by connecting with others in live chats, or connect and learn with AI. Developed at Deltahacks X.

name: üèÜ StudySpot
desc: Social media platform designed to track and promote the time students spend studying in the library. Sponsor winner at Deltahacks IX.

name: F1 Archive
desc: Website to give all past F1 race insights, including finishing positions, track history, lap records, etc. 50+ users and featured on API's application gallery.

name: WasteNoMore
desc: A python script developed to create a workflow for automatically recycling (or disposing of) containers, dependant on their suitability.

name: üîó Various Other Projects
desc: Other projects, which I consider a little bit older and out of date, can still be found on my Github as it shows my development as a developer.
